docs.lead_paragraph: Billionaire investor William Ackman called himself his "own worst enemy" in reviewing why last week's much hyped presentation on Herbalife Ltd.'s nutrition clubs failed to deliver the "death blow" he had originally promised.

headline.main: Ackman Takes Blame After Hyped Herbalife Talk Flopped
headline.print_headline: Ackman Takes Blame After Hyped Herbalife Talk Flopped

docs.snippet: Billionaire investor William Ackman called himself his "own worst enemy" in reviewing why last week's much hyped presentation on Herbalife Ltd.'s nutrition clubs failed to deliver the "death blow" he had originally promised.

docs.lead_paragraph: Kellogg's cereal sales are struggling, in part because Special K is falling out of fashion with dieters.

headline.main: Kellogg's Sales Hurt as Dieters Drop Special K
headline.print_headline: Kellogg's Sales Hurt as Dieters Drop Special K

docs.snippet: Kellogg's cereal sales are struggling, in part because Special K is falling out of fashion with dieters.

headline.main: Tax Inversions Spinning Out of Control

docs.abstract: Hospira’s potential $5 billion deal for a Danone unit highlights a variation on inversions: “spinversions.” The odd combination, says Robert Cyran of Reuters Breakingviews, also reflects the perverse incentives distorting corporate decisions.
docs.snippet: Hospira’s potential $5 billion deal for a Danone unit highlights a variation on inversions: “spinversions.” The odd combination, says Robert Cyran of Reuters Breakingviews, also reflects the perverse incentives distorting corporate decisions.

docs.lead_paragraph: The drink was once billed as a remedy for a number of health problems. But its marketers have changed their tune.
docs.abstract: Marketers have sharply scaled back on their claims that coconut water has a wide variety of health benefits, but sales continue to increase.
docs.snippet: The drink was once billed as a remedy for a number of health problems. But its marketers have changed their tune.

docs.lead_paragraph: Pfizer's second-quarter earnings plunged 79 percent from last year, when the world's second-largest drugmaker booked a $10 billion-plus gain from a business spinoff.

headline.main: Pfizer's 2Q Profit Sinks 79 Pct but Tops Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Pfizer's 2Q Profit Sinks 79 Pct but Tops Forecasts

docs.snippet: Pfizer's second-quarter earnings plunged 79 percent from last year, when the world's second-largest drugmaker booked a $10 billion-plus gain from a business spinoff.
